raw akas.title: Sofia die Erste - Auf einmal Prinzessin

akas: Sofia die Erste - Auf einmal Prinzessin Germany
akas from release info: Sofia die Erste - Auf einmal Prinzessin Germany

1.title: Day of the Sorcerers
1.plot: After a secret meeting of sorcerers, Cedric has to choose between taking over the kingdom and his friendship with Sofia.

2.title: The Secret Library: Tale of the Eternal Torch
2.plot: James stows away when he learns Sofia is on a mission to help the dragons of Blazing Palisades defend their home from invading sea serpents.

3.title: Pin the Blame on the Genie
3.plot: After Kazeem the genie is accused of wreaking havoc in Tangu, Sofia sets out to prove his innocence.

4.title: The Crown of Blossoms
4.plot: Sofia's first time to wear the crown of blossoms but the two gnomes need it because its theirs now Sofia and her friend Clover finds a way to save the day.

5.title: The Mystic Isles
5.plot: When Amber discovers Sofia's role as storykeeper, she comes along on a mission to the Mystic Isles to help a former crystal being get her Terra Crystal back.

6.title: The Mystic Isles: The Princess and the Protector
6.plot: Sofia meets her protector trainer, a feisty crystal fairy named Chrysta, and travels to the Isle of Forever Forest to begin her first assignment.

7.title: The Royal Dragon
7.plot: When Crackle doesn't have a dragon friend to bring to the annual Dragon Roast n' Toast, Sofia disguises herself as a dragon and tags along.

8.title: The Mystic Isles: The Mare of the Mist
8.plot: While traveling to the Mystic Isles on a quest, Minimus and Skye compete for Sofia's affection.

9.title: Through the Looking Back Glass
9.plot: After Cedric's sister Cordelia moves into the castle, the two siblings can't get along! Sofia tries to help by taking a peek into their past.

10.title: Princess Jade
10.plot: On School Swap Day, Jade goes to Royal Prep while Amber takes her place in the village at Dunwiddie School.

11.title: Ivy's True Colors
11.plot: Sofia's amulet summons her to help a princess in need, but that princess turns out to be Sofia's foe, Princess Ivy.

12.title: Too Cute to Spook
12.plot: Sofia invites Calista trick or treating.

13.title: Pirated Away
13.plot: While sailing to see a meteor shower, Sofia, Amber and Miranda are kidnapped by pirates!

14.title: The Mystic Isles: The Falcon's Eye
14.plot: Chrysta and Sofia go on a stakeout in Wei Ling to protect a Wicked 9 from Prisma.

15.title: The Mystic Isles: The Great Pretender
15.plot: When Sofia needs an animal helper for an alchemy presentation, she holds an audition to find the perfect assistant.

16.title: 'The Mystic Isles: A Very Mystic Wassailia'
16.plot: During the holiday time of Wassailia, Sofia helps Chrysta with last minute Protector missions in the Mystic Isles to help her get home in time to celebrate with her family.

17.title: The Birthday Wish
17.plot: Tizzy's misfired spell causes Sofia to endlessly repeat a disastrous birthday.

18.title: In Cedric We Trust
18.plot: When Wormwood steals Grimhilde's Crown, one of the Wicked 9, Sofia helps Cedric retrieve it to gain back the King's trust.

19.title: The Mystic Isles: A Hero for the Hoodwinks
19.plot: After seeing Sofia being rewarded as a Protector, Clover takes her place on a mission in the Mystic Isles.

20.title: The Mystic Isles: Undercover Fairies
20.plot: Sofia and Chrysta go undercover as fairies to stop a thief from stealing a magical Pixie Cup flower.

21.title: A Royal Wedding
21.plot: The arrival of the Queen Mum makes everyone question who will be the next king or queen; chaos ensues as Amber and James try to prove who will be the best.

22.title: The Royal School Fair
22.plot: Sofia and the other student in Royal Prep have to choose the next school.

23.title: The Lost Pyramid
23.plot: The Princess Adventure Club sets out on an adventure to recover the Lost Pyramid of Kaldoun.

24.title: Return to Merroway Cove
24.plot: All Oona wants is a chance to use the magic comb's powers. When she creates a huge tornado, she will have to ask her mom for help.

25.title: The Elf Situation
25.plot: When Sofia, Amber and James are left in charge of the castle for the day, they attempt to make peace between the River Elves and the Tree Elves.

26.title: Forever Royal
26.plot: As Sofia, and her siblings Amber and James, prepare for their graduation from Royal Prep Academy, Sofia is called back to the Mystic Isles to face an evil witch named Vor, who is trying to take over the kingdom of Enchancia.

1.title: Just One of the Princes
1.plot: Sofia strives to become the first princess to earn a spot on her school's flying derby team. Although paired with the overly-anxious horse Minimus, Sofia learns to believe in herself and proves that a princess can do anything she sets her mind to.

2.title: The Big Sleepover
2.plot: Sofia is put in a difficult position when she struggles to get her village friends Ruby and Jade and her new princess friends to get along and feel comfortable with each other during her first slumber party at the castle.

3.title: Let the Good Times Troll
3.plot: Sofia befriends the trolls that live in the cave near her new home but trouble ensues when her father can't let go of his fear of their banging, even when she brings them to the castle.

4.title: Cedric's Apprentice
4.plot: Cedric hires Sofia to be his apprentice in order to steal her amulet.

5.title: A Royal Mess
5.plot: The Golden Wing Circus is in town and the kids really want to go, but when James accidentally breaks a giant glass window his father was going to surprise his mother with as a result of breaking a castle rule, James and Sofia attempt to hide it while Amber distracts their parents.

6.title: The Shy Princess
6.plot: Sofia helps Vivian, a shy classmate overcome her fear of speaking in public; meanwhile, Clover makes friends with her dragon.

7.title: Blue Ribbon Bunny
7.plot: Sofia decides to enter Clover the rabbit in the Village Faire pet contest, but after pushing a little too hard, Sofia discovers a few things about friendship when she ends up unintentionally hurting his feelings before the contest.

8.title: The Princess Test
8.plot: When Flora, Fauna and Merryweather announce a big test, the princesses are put to the test but only one of them can win the trophy for showing the most important princess trait of all: kindness.

9.title: Baileywick's Day Off
9.plot: Baileywick celebrates his birthday with his brother, Nigel, with help from Sofia.

10.title: Tri-Kingdom Picnic
10.plot: Sofia shows James how to be a good sport.

11.title: The Little Witch
11.plot: A little witch's hexes causes big trouble for Sofia and her friends. When she asks the witch to stop she says it's going to be hard. Sofia helps her mend her evil ways but will Sofia stop the hexes or will chaos have it's way?

12.title: Two to Tangu
12.plot: Sofia and Amber visit the kingdom of Tangu and meet Princess Jasmine.

13.title: Finding Clover
13.plot: Clover is frustrated that Sofia is unable to spend time with him.

15.title: The Buttercups
15.plot: King Roland insists on sending Baileywick on a hike with Sofia.

16.title: Make Way for Miss Nettle
16.plot: A new fairy teacher arrives at Royal Prep.

18.title: Tea for Too Many
18.plot: Sofia hosts a Royal Prep tea party.

19.title: Princess Butterfly
19.plot: The students at Royal Prep make their own costumes.

20.title: Great Aunt-Venture
20.plot: Sofia reluctantly agrees to help Aunt Tilly bake a pie.

21.title: The Baker King
21.plot: One hectic morning, King Roland wishes he could have the simple life of a baker and gets his wish!

22.title: The Floating Palace
22.plot: During family vacation on the King's floating palace, Sofia befriends a curious, young mermaid.

23.title: Holiday in Enchancia
23.plot: When a storm keeps the King from going home for the holidays, Sofia leads her family to find him.

24.title: Four's a Crowd
24.plot: Sofia invites Jade and Ruby to decorate a flying coach with Amber for the annual Flylight Pageant.

1.title: Two Princesses and a Baby
1.plot: Amber seeks a magic spell so she won't have to share her birthday with James.

2.title: The Enchanted Feast
2.plot: Cedric is preparing to show off his magical skills at the Enchanted Feast: a grand dinner for all of the kings and queens in the Tri-Kingdom Area. When the evil fairy Miss Nettle disguises herself as a powerful sorceress known as Sascha and takes over the feast after tricking Roland into welcoming her in by showering the royal family with gifts, Sofia forms an unlikely team with Clover, Cedric and Wormwood to protect her amulet and save her family. Sofia learns, after summoning the Snow White, to trust her instincts.

3.title: The Flying Crown
3.plot: Sofia teams up with Prince Hugo for the Flying Derby championship race.

4.title: Mom's the Word
4.plot: Amber and James are invited to join Sofia's traditional Mother's Day picnic with her mom.

5.title: The Silent Knight
5.plot: Sofia meets a brave knight who is ashamed of his odd voice.

6.title: Enchanted Science Fair
6.plot: Sofia and her friends race to find a magical ingredient for their enchanted science projects.

7.title: King for a Day
7.plot: King Roland leaves James in charge of the kingdom for the day. Amber is convinced that James will ruin the kingdom. Meanwhile with the help of Sophia, Cedric and the townspeople James "tames" a baby giant.

8.title: When You Wish Upon a Well
8.plot: Amber makes a wish in a wishing well that accidentally turns Sofia into a cat!

9.title: Gizmo Gwen
9.plot: Sofia helps a young kitchen maid pursue her dream of being an inventor.

10.title: Sofia the Second
10.plot: Sofia casts a magic spell that creates a mischievous identical twin!

11.title: Mystic Meadows
11.plot: Sofia visits a magical retirement home for sorcerers and helps Cedric earn his family's powerful wand and his father's respect.

12.title: Princesses to the Rescue!
12.plot: On a trip to Wei-Ling, Sofia and Amber must rescue their families from a treasure-hoarding tiger.

13.title: Ghostly Gala
13.plot: Sofia tries to keep a ghost from scaring everyone out of the castle on Halloween.

14.title: The Emerald Key
14.plot: Sofia and her family must figure out which of two mysterious visitors is a real princess.

15.title: Scrambled Pets
15.plot: Sofia and her friends bring their pets to school, but immediately regret the decision when they accidentally get scrambled during a sorcery class.

16.title: The Princess Stays in the Picture
16.plot: Sofia and Hildegard get stuck inside a painting, but finding an escape plan gets more complicated when Hildegard insists she knows everything.

17.title: Baileywhoops
17.plot: Baileywick is cursed by a new castle steward, in an attempt to take over his job. Sofia decides to help him out by becoming his steward assistant.

18.title: The Curse of Princess Ivy
18.plot: Princess Ivy has turned the whole kingdom of Enchancia black and white! It's up to Sofia and Amber to save the day.

19.title: Winter's Gift
19.plot: It's winter and Sofia and her friends are planning a holiday celebration and light show in the village.

20.title: The Leafsong Festival
20.plot: The animals are planning to put on a singing talent show. Crackle wants to sing in the show but her fire is getting in the way. Cedric jumps on the chance to take over the kingdom by using Crackle's flame that she wants to get rid of so she can sing in the show.

21.title: Substitute Cedric
21.plot: Cedric steps in as substitute teacher for Sofia's sorcery class and helps the students of Royal Prep protect their school after a group of visiting pranksters arrive to wreak havoc.

22.title: Clover Time
22.plot: Sofia is trying to plan time with Clover, when strange new activities pop up. Sofia is going to have to choose Clover over friends.

23.title: In a Tizzy
23.plot: After teaming up with an over-eager fairy godmother, Sofia's friend Ruby learns that a little assistance is nice, but sometimes you have to do things on your own.

24.title: A Tale of Two Teams
24.plot: It's field day at school and everybody is excited to play against each other, except Amber.

25.title: The Littlest Princess
25.plot: When Sofia helps three wee sprites, her amulet grants her the power to become tiny. But when she disobeys her mother, the amulet curses her and prevents her from growing big.

26.title: Buttercup Amber
26.plot: Sofia and her friends go on an adventure to pearl valley, when princess Amber tags along.

27.title: Carol of the Arrow
27.plot: Sofia meets local hero, Carol of the Arrow, and tries to do a good deed so she can join Carol's merry band.

28.title: Sidekick Clio
28.plot: All of the princesses are getting ready for the big magic festival. But the only one who is not allowed to go is princess Clio.

1.title: Cool Hand Fluke
1.plot: Fluke, a mer-boy, tries to impress the mer-kids of Merroway Cove and winds up getting them and Sofia trapped in the undersea cave of a giant narwhal!

2.title: Minimus Is Missing
2.plot: When all of the flying horses in the entire kingdom, including Minimus, have gone missing without any reason, Sofia and her siblings are setting out on a search and rescue mission to bring them all home.

3.title: Cedric Be Good
3.plot: Cedric finally steals Sofia's amulet, but it only brings about curse after curse.

4.title: Princess Adventure Club
4.plot: When Princess Zooey starts a club and excludes Amber, Sofia tries to help her sister and new friend get along.

5.title: Minding the Manor
5.plot: When Sofia is left in charge of Aunt Tilly's house, she must protect it from a group of invading gargoyles.

6.title: The Secret Library
6.plot: Princess Sofia discovers a secret library and goes on a mission to rescue Minimus' brother.

7.title: New Genie on the Block
7.plot: While visiting the kingdom of Tangu, Sofia releases a young, unruly genie from a lamp and must team up with Sgt. Fizz of the Genie Patrol to apprehend the runaway genie.

8.title: The Fliegel Has Landed
8.plot: When an evil witch threatens Sofia's troll friends, she must show the trolls how to stand up for themselves.

9.title: The Princess Ballet
9.plot: Sofia and Amber invite Princess Kari to perform ballet at Royal Prep's Open House. But Princess Kari, who is usually great at everything, struggles to learn the steps.

10.title: All the Sprite Moves
10.plot: Princess Vivian is upset about her family's move to a new castle and enlists Sofia's Wee Sprite friends to help sabotage the move by making it seem like the new castle is cursed.

11.title: Sofia in Elvenmoor
11.plot: Sofia and Clover fall through a portal at the bottom of a silver tree and enter the magical world of Elvenmoor.

12.title: Stormy Lani
12.plot: Sofia learns her friend, Princess Lani, has the power to alter the weather according to her moods, but this is a power Lani has trouble controlling.

13.title: Lord of the Rink
13.plot: Prince Hugo would rather ice dance than play hockey, much to the chagrin of his father.

14.title: The Secret Library: Olaf and the Tale of Miss Nettle
14.plot: Miss Nettle is back, stronger and more powerful than ever and is hiding in the school.

15.title: Gone with the Wand
15.plot: During a trip to Merlin's castle, Cedric's trouble-making niece swipes the famous magician's wand, which summons his arch-enemy Morgana who wants to keep the wand for herself.

16.title: Bad Little Dragon
16.plot: After Sofia and Vivian find an adorable baby dragon in the woods, they soon discovers he's not as innocent as he first appears.

17.title: Bunny Swap
17.plot: When Clover and a wild bunny named Barley mistakenly switch places, Clover must rediscover his wild side so he can find his way home.

18.title: Her Royal Spyness
18.plot: Amber has been having strange feelings about Sofia and her amulet, so she keeps an eye on her.

19.title: Best in Air Show
19.plot: Grand Mum comes to visit Enchancia and Sofia helps Minimus muster the confidence to perform a bold stunt routine in his parents' flying horse show.

20.title: Dads and Daughters Day
20.plot: It's Father's Day and Sofia and Amber are going on an adventure. Amber is trying to avoid Sofia and take dad for herself.

21.title: The Secret Library: The Tale of the Noble Knight
21.plot: When Sofia visits the Secret Library, she learns The Tale of a Noble Knight seeking the Ice Fire Shield.

22.title: The Bamboo Kite
22.plot: Sofia visits the kingdom of Wei Ling to attend the Festival of Kites, where Jun has the honor of launching the first kite this year.

23.title: Beauty Is the Beast
23.plot: When Sofia's amulet summons her to help Princess Charlotte of Isleworth, she must break an enchantress' curse that turned Charlotte into a beast.

24.title: Cauldronation Day
24.plot: Sofia needs to help her friend Lucinda and other witches to make a golden cauldron and send it to another witch who wants it and she will not disturb them.

25.title: Camp Wilderwood
25.plot: When James gets homesick at Camp Wilderwood, he and his friend Miles hatch a plan to escape.

26.title: Royal Vacation
26.plot: Miranda plans a family vacation in order to spend quality time together, but it turns out to be the worst vacation ever.

27.title: The Princess Prodigy
27.plot: When Princess Vivian is offered an apprenticeship under her idol, famed musician Baron Von Rocha, she starts neglecting her friends and responsibilities.

28.title: Hexley Hall
28.plot: When Sofia notices that her amulet is changing, she enlists Cedric's help to discover why.

29.title: One for the Books
29.plot: It's first day of a new school year for Sofia, James, Amber, Vivian and Desmond and they have a new teacher.

imdb.plot outline: Sofia, is a little girl with a commoner's background until her mom marries the King and suddenly she is royalty. With the help of the three fairies in charge of the Royal Training Academy, Sofia learns that looking like a princess isn't all that hard but behaving like one must come from the heart.
imdb.title: Sofia the First
plot: Sofia, is a little girl with a commoner's background until her mom marries the King and suddenly she is royalty. With the help of the three fairies in charge of the Royal Training Academy, Sofia learns that looking like a princess isn't all that hard but behaving like one must come from the heart.::Anonymous

Sofia is someone with a commoner's background but then one day her mother marries the king and suddenly Sofia's life has changed a lot. Sofia gained a new family and home and even new friends to help her on her journey. And also a magical amulet that Sofia wears around her neck also helps her to become a better princess, too.::funnygal-895-718771

Sofia is an ordinary girl who lives in the village with her mom. One day Sofia's mom married king Roland, and her life turned around. she no longer lives in the village, but lives in a castle with a new family and new princess friends. And as a gift for moving to the castle king Roland gives Sofia amulet that gives her help when she needs it and amazing power when she performs a good deed.

Sofia was a girl in the village. She was doing alright. Then, she became a princess overnight. Now she has to figure out how to do it right, and there's so much to learn and see. She's up in the castle with her new family, and at a school that's just for royalty. A whole enchanted world is waiting for her, and she's so excited to be _Sofia the First_ (qv).::nevernottom

"_Sofia the First_ (qv)" is set in the storybook world of Enchancia and tells the story of Princess Sofia, an adventurous little girl who is learning how to adjust to royal life after her mom marries the king and she becomes a princess overnight. Upon moving into the castle to live with her new family including her step-father, King Roland II, and step-siblings, Amber and James, Sofia quickly discovers that looking like a princess isn't all that difficult, but possessing the characteristics of a true princess - honesty, loyalty, courage, independence, compassion and grace - is what makes one truly royal. Helping her in her journey are the three headmistresses of Royal Prep Academy - Fauna, Flora and Merryweather (the beloved fairies seen in Disney's classic "Sleeping Beauty"); the royal steward, Baileywick; and a group of cute woodland creatures led by a wise-talking rabbit named Clover. Classic Disney Princesses make special appearances in event episodes to offer Sofia words of wisdom - princess to princess.::Disney Channel PR
